name: Mobile Acrobat
text: You harness your acrobatic momentum to quickly propel yourself forward.
benefit: When attempting an Acrobatics check that would reduce your speed, treat your base speed as 10 feet faster before making speed reductions.
text_zh: 你利用特技的冲力来使你自己快速前进。
benefit_zh: 当你尝试一个会降低你速度的特技检定时，在决定速度减值前，你的基础速度被视为比正常快10尺。
